com.illcode.meterman

Class WorldState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.illcode.meterman.WorldState

  • public class WorldState
extends Object
    A class representing the entire state of the game world. An instance of this class will be serialized to yield save data.

    Games should avoid putting any references to external objects (like the system bundle) into the worldData, because it will cause problems with proper serialization and deserialization. (Particularly, don't save references to TextBundleS of any sort in your world graph, because they won't serialize properly.) We can serialize BitSetS and PatternS, but don't go willy-nilly throwing fancy objects into your classes.

    See Also:
    KryoPersistence.init()
